Curam Infrastructure
API Specification

Packages 
Package Description

curam.core.impl  
curam.core.impl.admin  
curam.core.impl.search.datatypes  
curam.core.impl.util  
curam.core.struct  
curam.util.administration.fact
Contains the factory classes used to create the instances for the Cúram administration infrastructure process classes
curam.util.administration.impl
Contains the classes and utilities which provide support for administrating Curam.
curam.util.administration.intf  
curam.util.administration.struct
Contains the class structures used to pass details to and from the Cúram administration infrastructure process classes
curam.util.audit
Contains the classes and interfaces used to handle audit information
curam.util.cache
This package contains classes and interfaces for the Curam Cache service.
curam.util.cache.exception
This package contains exceptions raised by the Curam Cache service.
curam.util.codetable
Contains the code tables used by the Cúram infrastructure classes
curam.util.collection  
curam.util.common.tab
Contains base for utility classes that handle the manuipulation of the resources that store the configurations used in the tabbed user interface
curam.util.configuration  
curam.util.connectors.axis2
Contains classes for supporting incoming web services using Axis2
curam.util.connectors.mqseries
Contains utility classes for connecting to other systems using JMS, such as MQ Series
curam.util.ctm.bom
Contains the interfaces and utilities which provide support for implementing the infrastructure BOMS for the CTM infrastructure
curam.util.ctm.bom.annotation  
curam.util.ctm.bom.businessobjectidentifier
Contains the interfaces and implemetation classes for business object identifier which assists the business object module infrastructure to uniquely identify a business object in persistent storage using the identifier
curam.util.ctm.bom.businessobjectinformation
Contains the interfaces and implemetation classes for business object information and home page parameter used in CTM infrastructure
curam.util.ctm.bom.event.impl
Contains the classes and utilities which provide support for transporting events using the CTM infrastructure
curam.util.ctm.bom.impl
Contains the classes and utilities which provide support for transporting infrastructure BOMS using the CTM infrastructure
curam.util.ctm.bom.resources.impl
Contains the classes and utilities which provide support for transporting Resource Store records using the CTM infrastructure
curam.util.ctm.bom.rules.impl
Contains the classes and utilities which provide support for transporting Ruleset records using the CTM infrastructure
curam.util.ctm.bom.uitab.impl  
curam.util.dataaccess
Provides the API for accessing and processing data in a data source
curam.util.deferredprocessing.impl
Contains interface definition for application-defined deferred processing callback methods
curam.util.events.impl
Contains classes and interfaces that support event handling in Curam
curam.util.events.struct
Contains the class structures used to pass details to and from the Cúram event infrastructure process classes
curam.util.exception
Contains the various exception types thrown by Curam and classes used to manipulate these exceptions
curam.util.exception.message  
curam.util.exception.message.impl  
curam.util.fact
Contains the factory classes used to create the instances for the deferred processing classes
curam.util.factory  
curam.util.iegtwo.struct  
curam.util.impl
Contains the entry classes into the batch launcher and deferred processing utilities.
curam.util.intf  
curam.util.jms.jmslite
Contains the classes that provide the JMSLite server for testing queued Curam operations (Workflow and Deferred Processing) outside of an Application Server
curam.util.jmx
This package contains classes and interfaces for the Curam JMX service.
curam.util.jmx.extpoints
This package contains classes used in the JMX instrumentation of application extension points.
curam.util.jmx.mbean
This package contains useful classes for building custom MBeans.
curam.util.message  
curam.util.message.impl  
curam.util.orgtree.impl
Contains the API for the custom organisation tree loader
curam.util.persistence
Contains the underlying infrastructure classes for mapping objects to and from a relational database.
curam.util.persistence.fact  
curam.util.persistence.helper
Contains helper classes for commonly-used patterns in object/relational mappings.
curam.util.persistence.helper.message  
curam.util.persistence.helper.message.impl  
curam.util.persistence.intf  
curam.util.persistence.message  
curam.util.persistence.message.impl  
curam.util.persistence.struct  
curam.util.persistence.validation.basic.validator
Provides a set of common basic validator implementations, independent of the Customizable Validation infrastructure.
curam.util.persistence.validation.customizable
Contains the core Customizable Validations infrastructure.
curam.util.persistence.validation.customizable.validator
Provides out-of-the-box validator implementations for a number of common validations.
curam.util.resources
This package contains various utility classes.
curam.util.resources.impl
Contains the API for accessing the Properties Resource Cache
curam.util.rules  
curam.util.rules.evidence
Contains the classes and utilities for manipulation of evidence in the business rules engine
curam.util.security
Provides the classes and interfaces for the Curam's security framework
curam.util.struct
Contains the class structures used to pass details to and from the deferred processing classes
curam.util.tab.impl
Contains the interfaces required for dynamic support of the tabbed user interface menu bar and navigation tree
curam.util.timer
Contains the classes related to the generic Timer Bean functionality
curam.util.trace
This package contains classes and interfaces used in application tracing.
curam.util.transaction
Contains the classes useful for getting information regarding the currently executing transaction
curam.util.type
Contains the fundamental object type classes that are used by the Curam.
curam.util.type.message  
curam.util.type.message.impl  
curam.util.type.struct
Contains the struct type classes that are used by the Curam.
curam.util.userpreference.impl
Contains the API for use with user preferences
curam.util.webservices
This package contains classes and interfaces used for dealing with web services.
curam.util.xml.fact
Contains the factory classes used to create the instances for the Cúram XML and XSL administration infrastructure process classes
curam.util.xml.impl
Contains the classes and utilities which provide support for administrating XSL templates and XML documents.
curam.util.xml.intf  
curam.util.xml.struct
Contains the class structures used to pass details to and from the Cúram XML and XSL administration infrastructure process classes
curam.util.xmlserver
The Curam XML Server is a Java application that processes XML documents generated by a Curam application server, applying XSL templates and rendering to PDF, RTF, HTML, or plain text.
